title: Create a Shopify Theme section for Nx

name.description: The name of the new theme section
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

project.description: The name of the project where the section will be generated.
project.x-prompt: What is the name of the project for this section?

directory.description: Create the section under this directory relative to src/theme/sections (can be nested).

flat.description: Create section files at the directory root rather than its own directory.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new section.
